title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) [Repealed]
(b) Route 299. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 299, between IR 87 and US Route 9W, in the Towns of New Paltz and Lloyd. (c) [Eff. until Sept. 1, 1999, see also
subd. (c) below.] Route 209. Route
209 between the Ulster/Sullivan county line and the V.A.W. of America and

Scharade Cuttlery terminals in the Village of Ellenville, and Town of

Wawarsing. (c) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (c) above.] US Route
209. US Route 209 between the Ulster/Sullivan county line and US Route 9W, a
distance of 35.3+- miles, in the Village of Ellenville and the Towns of

Wawarsing, Rochester, Marbletown, Hurley and Ulster. (d) [Eff. until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (d) below.] Route 208. Route 208
between the Ulster-Orange county line and US Route 44/55, a distance of 7+-
miles in the Towns of Shawangunk and Gardiner. (d) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also
subd. (d) above.] Route 208. Route
208 between the Ulster-Orange county line and Routes 32 and 299 a distance of
12.7+- miles in the Village of New Paltz and the Towns of Shawangunk, Gardiner
and New Paltz. (e) US Route 44/55. US Route 44/55 between Route 208 and 144 Main Street Gardiner, a distance of
1.5+- miles in the Town of Gardiner. (f) Route 32. Route 32 between the junction
of Route 208 and 299 and Route 213, a distance of 4.7+- miles in the Towns of

New Paltz and Esopus. (g) Route 28. Route 28 between IR 87 (NYS Thruway exit 19) and the Delaware county line, a
distance of 35.5+- miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8151.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
